backend/main.mo: Defines actor with storage and authorization mixins, hardcoded admin data, session management, and extensive types for content, users, media, and UI sections.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a documentation-related feature to frontend/src/App.tsx with metadata, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend components, hooks, context, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base configuration defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and root-level styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file setting up root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/ADMIN_ROUTES.md: Documentation explaining where admin routes are defined and listing the login and dashboard route details.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router setup using TanStack Router, defining landing page and admin routes with LanguageProvider and Toaster integration.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Bilingual About section showing company story text and statistic cards with animated, styled visual elements.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Shows an access denied message for non-admin users with navigation buttons to home and admin login.
frontend/src/components/admin/ContentBlo: Admin tool for creating content blocks with text, images, block type selection, ordering, and upload progress.
frontend/src/components/admin/Diagnostic: Runs admin diagnostics by checking auth, fetching products, and performing test CRUD operations with status updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/HowToOrder: Admin interface to add or edit 'How to Order' steps, including text fields, image uploads, and ordering.
frontend/src/components/admin/InstagramF: Provides a UI to view and update Instagram feed settings, including handle, embed code, titles, descriptions, order, and visibility.
frontend/src/components/admin/PackagesMa: Allows admins to create, edit, and delete packages with multilingual fields, pricing, and image upload support.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductsMa: Enables managing products by adding, editing, or removing items with multilingual text, pricing, and image handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/SectionsMa: Manages additional landing page sections with multilingual content, order, visibility, and optional image/background uploads.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Displays admin users and provides a dialog to create new accounts with username, name, and password.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Bilingual contact form with validation, toast notifications, and display of contact info and social links.
Fetches additional sections and renders visible ones with localized titles, descriptions, images, and content blocks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with branding, contact info, social links, and scroll-based navigation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with scroll styling, navigation buttons, language toggle, and admin navigation.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the hero section with background visuals, animated elements, localized text, and buttons that scroll to key sections.
frontend/src/components/HowToOrder.tsx: Shows a multi‑step ordering guide with icons and translations plus a button to scroll to the contact section.
frontend/src/components/InstagramFeed.ts: Displays a configurable Instagram feed section with localization, intersection animations, and optional embed or profile link.
frontend/src/components/Packages.tsx: Displays a grid of predefined package items with translated titles, descriptions, images, and tags.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Renders a list of product cards using translation keys, showing images, names, descriptions, and tags.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a language context with English/Spanish translations and a translation helper function.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin login sessions with validation, timeout handling, storage, and logout logic using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for loading, storing, and managing user identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, packages, profiles, admin data, and other backend resources.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, utility classes, and Instagram embed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with session validation, error handling, logout flow, and tabs for managing products, packages, content, and diagnostics.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLogin.tsx: Provides the admin login form with session validation, error handling, actor checks, and redirects on successful login.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionStorage.t: Utility for reading, writing, and clearing the admin session ID from localStorage with error-safe access.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based query parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project’s styling system.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, feature definitions, and configuration for project tracking.
